translation: The Blessed Lord said, "It is very hard indeed to see this form of Mine which thou hast seen; even the gods are ever longing to behold it."
commentary: 11.52 Sudurdarsham very hard to see? This is this? form form? Have you seen thou hast seen? that which? My My? Gods gods? Even also? of this (of) this? of form of form? Everyday ever? Darshankaṅkṣiṇāḥ (are) desrious to behold.Commentary Lord Krishna says to Arjuna Though the gods long to behold the Cosmic Form yet they have not seen it as you have done. THey can never behold it.Just as the Chataka (a bird) longs
